name: Endless Tales
description:
Synopsis:

There's so many tales in everyone's life that no one knows. So few it barely noticed, mostly because everyone is focused in their own tale to live.

They don't know that the world they're live in has its own tale, and it would revolve around the lives of everyone in this world.

And some people unknowingly involved in its tale directly. Little they know that every decisions they would make, will bring the world to an unforeseen fate. 

Control:

  • Keyboard
  • Mouse
  • GamePad

Features:

  • 2 (two) character selection with slightly different story.
  • Multiple class selection.
  • Multiple ending possibilities.
